bot.welcome: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to the Remnawave admin bot. Control users, nodes, and billing from one place.
bot.help:
â„¹ï¸ Quick commands:

Core:
/start â€” welcome
/help â€” this help
/health â€” system check
/stats â€” summary
/bandwidth â€” traffic

Users:
Users â†’ Find user (menu) â€” search by username/email/Telegram ID/description
/user_create <username> <expire_iso> [telegram_id] â€” create user

Infra:
/nodes â€” list nodes
/node <uuid> â€” node details
/nodes_usage â€” realtime usage
/nodes_range <start_iso> <end_iso> â€” traffic by range
/hosts â€” list hosts
/host <uuid> â€” host details

Other:
/sub <short_uuid> â€” subscription
/tokens â€” API tokens
/templates â€” templates
/snippets â€” snippets
/configs â€” configs
/billing â€” billing
/providers â€” providers

bulk.title: ğŸ“¦ Bulk actions:
bulk.overview:
ğŸ“¦ Bulk for users:
â€¢ Quick: reset all, delete expired, extend all +7/+30.
â€¢ Lists: /bulk_delete <uuid...>, /bulk_revoke <uuid...>, /bulk_reset <uuid...>, /bulk_extend <days> <uuid...>, /bulk_status <STATUS> <uuid...>.
â€¢ Statuses: ACTIVE/DISABLED/LIMITED/EXPIRED. UUID separated by spaces or newlines.
